title: SSI-K3
instructions: Please rate the degree to which each statement applies to you or your current situation, using the given scale.

q_text.text: My studies (or my job) are at present a big burden for me.
There have been many changes in my life, which I need to cope with.
My current life circumstances are very tough.
I must deal with big changes in my life.
I must cope with a lot of difficulties.
Recently, I have had a lot of trouble.
I am currently confronted with many difficulties in my life.
I must adjust to completely new life circumstances.
